summary.span: 从客户端收到作为请求数据一部分的潜在恶意输入字符串时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a potentially malicious input string is received from the client as part of the request data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 约束和验证用户输入在 Web 应用程序中至关重要，以防黑客攻击依赖于恶意输入字符串。Constraining and validating user input is essential in a Web application to prevent hacker attacks that rely on malicious input strings. 跨站点脚本攻击是此类攻击的一个示例。Cross-site scripting attacks are one example of such hacks. 其他类型的恶意或不需要的数据可通过各种输入形式通过请求传入。Other types of malicious or undesired data can be passed in a request through various forms of input. 通过限制在应用程序的较低级别传递的数据类型，您可以防止不必要的事件，即使使用您的代码的程序员没有适当的验证技巧。By limiting the kinds of data that is passed at a low level in an application, you can prevent undesirable events, even when programmers who are using your code do not put the proper validation techniques in place. 请求验证会检测潜在的恶意客户端输入，并引发此异常以中止处理请求。Request validation detects potentially malicious client input and throws this exception to abort processing of the request. 请求中止可能表示试图危害应用程序的安全性，如跨站点脚本攻击。A request abort can indicate an attempt to compromise the security of your application, such as a cross-site scripting attack. 强烈建议应用程序显式检查有关请求中止的所有输入。It is strongly recommended that your application explicitly check all input regarding request aborts. 但是，你可以通过将 `validateRequest` 指令中的属性设置为来禁用请求验证 `false` 若要对应用程序禁用请求验证，必须修改或创建应用程序的 Web.config 文件，并将 `validateRequest` 节的属性设置 `pages` 为 `false` ，如下面的示例中所示：To disable request validation for your application, you must modify or create a Web.config file for request validation for all applications on your server, you can make this modification to the Machine.config file. > [!NOTE] > 强烈建议应用程序显式检查它使用的所有输入以及 ASP.NET 执行的请求验证。It is strongly recommended that your application explicitly check all inputs it uses in addition to the request validation performed by ASP.NET. 请求验证功能无法捕获所有的攻击，尤其是专门针对应用程序逻辑精心设计的攻击。The request validation feature cannot catch all
